#summary Implementations of the URI Template specification

= Introduction =

Implementations of the URI Template specification, [http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6570 RFC6570], along with the version / level of the spec they claim to implement (e.g., "08" for draft -08). 

Implementers note: a [https://github.com/uri-templates/uritemplate-test common test suite] is being collected.

  * [http://sourceforge.net/projects/opendkim C] (?)
  * [https://github.com/tavis-software/UriTemplates C#] (RFC level 4)
  * [https://bitbucket.org/dfa/uritemplate Clojure] (06)
  * [https://github.com/EiffelWebFramework/EWF/tree/master/library/protocol/uri_template Eiffel] (?)
  * [http://tfletcher.com/dev/erlang-uri-template Erlang]
  * [http://hackage.haskell.org/cgi-bin/hackage-scripts/package/uri-template Haskell] (?)
  * [http://incubator.apache.org/abdera/docs/api/org/apache/abdera/i18n/templates/Template.html Abdera (Java)] (?)
  * [http://www.metanotion.net/software/urlmapper/ Java] (?)
  * [https://github.com/trevorr/uritemplate Java] (08)
  * [https://github.com/Cloudname/uritemplate Java] (?)
  * [http://code.google.com/p/uritemplate/ Java] (?)
  * [https://github.com/damnhandy/Handy-URI-Templates Java] (RFC level 4)

  * [https://github.com/marc-portier/uri-templates JavaScript] (?)

If you leave a pointer to a project in the comments I will remove your comment after I have added it to the list (nothing personal, this will just make it easier for me to track which links I've added to the list).
